description: Get course content based on the content given
query: query { contents(first: 1, filter: { ContentContainer:  { contains: $Topic } }) { items { ContentContainer } } }

description: Get course enrollments for specific student by giving the userid
query: query { courseEnrollments(first: 100, filter: { Username: {eq : $userid } } ) { items { Username SubjectID EnrollmentID CompletionPercent } } }

description: List all contents finished by the student based on the username (returns course trackings and their contents with learning level details).
query: query { courseTrackings(first: 1000, filter: { StudentUsername: { eq: $username } }) { items { contents { ContentID learningLevels { SubjectID LevelName LearningLevelID courseVersions{ Title }} } } } }

description: Get contents NOT finished by a student for a given SubjectID and LearningLevelID by excluding multiple finished ContentIDs (pass the finished content IDs and add them as multiple neq conditions).
query: query { learningLevels(filter: { SubjectID: { eq: $subjectId } and: [{ LearningLevelID: { eq: $learningLevelId } }] }) { items { SubjectID LearningLevelID LevelName contents(filter: { and: [ { ContentID: { neq: $finishedContentId1 } } { ContentID: { neq: $finishedContentId2 } } ] }) { items { ContentID } } } } }

description: List contents by a provided list of ContentIDs.
query: query { contents(filter: { ContentID: { in: [$contentIds] } }) { items { ContentID ContentContainer } } }
